change.changenote: Note: This regulation has been placed in the Regulations Point in Time collection. This regulation is not repealed.

definition.def: and board member have the same meanings as in Part 2 of the Act.

section.sectiontext: Notice of the date, time and location of any meeting of the board must be given to each board member at least 5 days before the meeting.
The amount of remuneration prescribed for the purposes of section 116 (1) (e) of the Act is,

paragraph.paragraphtext: for the chair of the board, $250 for each day that he or she is engaged in meetings of the board for the purpose of exercising the board's powers and performing its duties under Part 2 of the Act, and
for any other board member, $200 for each day that he or she is engaged in meetings of the board for the purpose of exercising the board's powers and performing its duties under Part 2 of the Act.
